sections.heading: Emergency; Governor; direct assumption of control
sections.text: In the event of an emergency, the Governor may direct the assumption of control over all or part of the communications system pursuant to the Emergency Management Act.SourceLaws 1967, c. 572, ยง 11, p. 1884;R.R.S.1943, ยง 81-1120.11;Laws 1975, LB 427,
